title: Worlds start time oce
body:
Hey all, on the main page for worlds, the first game (RNG vs FB) is scheduled to start tomorrow at 6:30pm. Is this 6:30pm aest? If not, what time does it start in Australia? 

Thanks

replies.body:
It's 6.30pm Sydney or Melbourne time
If you are in Adelaide, probably 6pm-ish
Why would you even watch lcs? You suck.

> [{quoted}](name=SiffLort,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=O0IFvv4h,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-04T06:14:43.455+0000)
>
> Why would you even watch lcs? You suck.

Hey!!

Its worlds :)

THis is where all the regions come together and compete for glory and the title of 2017 world champions :D
